title: I want to open a restaurant that streams league and holds in house tournaments, am I allowed to?
body: I went through [this](https://developer.riotgames.com/policies.html#tournamentpolicies) and found a little bit of information but I'm still unsure. My gut tells me that just offering the game for players to play (as tournaments or otherwise) and to stream twitch is okay but I want to be sure. If I am missing something can someone help fill me in?
